info.name: Aurora Hotel Management System
info.description:
Comprehensive API Testing Collection for Aurora Hotel System

## Test Flow

1. **Authentication** - Login and get tokens
    
2. **User Management** - Register and manage users
    
3. **Branch Management** - Create and manage hotel branches
    
4. **Amenity Management** - Manage hotel amenities (WiFi, TV, etc.)
    
5. **Facility Management** - Manage branch facilities (Pool, Gym, Spa)
    
6. **Room Type Management** - Configure room types
    
7. **Room Management** - Manage individual rooms
    
8. **Service Management** - Hotel services (Laundry, Room service, etc.)
    
9. **Promotion Management** - Discounts and promotions
    
10. **Booking Management** - Room bookings
    
11. **Booking Room** - Booking-Room relationship
    
12. **Service Booking** - Service bookings for guests
    
13. **Payment Management** - Process payments
    
14. **Role & Permission** - Manage access control
    
15. **RAG (AI Chat)** - AI-powered chat using hotel knowledge base
    
16. **Document Management** - Upload, manage, and download documents
    

## Authentication

All endpoints (except register and login) require Bearer token authentication.

## Default Users

- **Admin**: username=`admin`, password=`Admin@123`
    
- **Manager**: username=`manager`, password=`Manager@123`
    
- **Staff**: username=`staff`, password=`Staff@123`
    
- **Customer**: username=`customer`, password=`Customer@123`
    

## New Features

- **RAG AI Chat**: Intelligent responses using retrieval augmented generation
    
- **Document Management**: Full CRUD operations for document handling

item.name: 01. Authentication

request.description: Register a new user account (no authentication required)
Login with credentials and session metadata. Returns access token in response body and sets refresh token as HttpOnly cookie.
Get current authenticated user session information
Get current authenticated user detailed information
Refresh access token using refresh token from cookie. Requires refresh_token cookie to be sent automatically.
Get all active sessions for the current user. Requires refresh_token cookie.
Remove a specific session by session ID. User can only remove their own sessions.
Logout and clear refresh token cookie. Invalidates the current session.

item.name: 07. RAG (AI Chat) Management

query.value: dịch vụ của khách sạn aurora
query.description: The message/question to ask the AI system
Optional chat session ID for conversation continuity

request.description: Synchronous chat with AI using RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation). Returns complete response at once.

query.value: dịch vụ của khách sạn aurora
query.description: The message/question to ask the AI system (default: 'dịch vụ của khách sạn aurora')
Optional chat session ID for conversation continuity (default: '1')

request.description: Streaming chat with AI using RAG. Returns response as Server-Sent Events (SSE) for real-time streaming.

query.description: Query to test content retrieval (default: 'aurora có ưu đãi gì?')

request.description: Test the content retriever component. Returns raw retrieved content without AI processing.

item.description: RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) AI Chat System - Provides intelligent responses using hotel knowledge base

item.name: 08. Document Management

request.description: Upload a new document file. Returns document metadata including ID, filename, file type, and upload timestamp.
Get list of all uploaded documents with their metadata (ID, filename, file type, size, upload date).
Download a specific document by ID. Returns the file with appropriate content type and filename headers.

formdata.description: The new document file to replace the existing one

request.description: Update an existing document by replacing it with a new file. Returns updated document metadata.
Delete a document by ID. This permanently removes the document and its metadata.

item.description: Document Management System - Upload, download, update, and delete documents for the hotel system
